summary: 1991  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: John Delphus "J.D." McDuffie, Jr.  was an American racing driver. He competed in the NASCAR Winston Cup from 1963 to 1991, and collected 106 top-tens during his career and holds the record for most starts in NASCAR's top level without a win. He died in a racing accident at Watkins Glen International in 1991.
title: J. D. McDuffie
